reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got these for an intensive bootcamp and used them 6 days a week 5-8 hours a day, and they were amazing, very comfy for extended use. love the look of them, the noise cancellation was really nice and the only times I ever had spotty connection from the bluetooth was due to either faulty internet or an extremely old laptop. I was able to walk roughly 30 feet/10m from the source with no issues. You DO notice the lack of noise cancellation when its plugged in, but fortunately, at least for my ears, the headphones fit very well so it still did a decent job of blocking outside noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really liking these lightweight Skull Candy headphones! They were super easy to pair with my Samsung S22 Ultra, battery life is great so far, and the sound is terrific. Super noise cancelling- can't hear the printer next to me with these on! - and they're comfortable to wear. I do wish they would get a little tighter since I have a small head, but they fit nicely and I can wear these on the flight to Italy - they fold up into an easy-to carry little package and as mentioned, they don't weigh much at all. Very nice solution and way more comfortable than ear buds!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great warranty! Great sound for the price!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using skullcandy since college. I didn’t feel like paying $378 for a larger brand. I just need them for my room to block out the sound. No humming sound. The music on my iPhone is super loud. Wish it was louder on my new Samsung tv but maybe it’s so I don’t blow my ears out. I know they can get louder. Still amazing headphones for the price. They are super light, my ears fit in the ear cups. The color is cool. The battery life is real good. Cool purple light that comes on when you are using them. One button to turn the ANC off. Super short charging cable though. I would invest in a longer USB-c cable to charge them. No complaints with these. Buy them, one be disappointed for $100

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great headphones but there’s an issue
reviews.reviewText: I’ve heard so many good reviews about these headphones and this brand through friends and my other headphones needed an upgrade so I decided to buy these new ones. I was super excited and i’m glad I got them. They are good quality, I love the color and the fit of it around my ears. The sound quality is also very clear and it can get suuuuuuuper loud. The only issue I have is that the audio leaks out of the headphones. Bad. Like, you can barely listen to your music at mid volume without everyone else listening to your music with you too, bad. I haven’t seen many reviews talk about the audio leak so here’s your warning. If that doesn't bother you too much, I would still totally recommend these headphones. 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a Skullcandy kinda girl
reviews.reviewText: Skullcandy has been my preferred brand for years. I always bought their wired earbuds. I've had other more expensive brand wireless headphones but these are by far my favorite!Pairing them to your phone is easy. The buttons for sound/ skipping tracks have a raised mark making them easy to identify. The power on/ of switch is smooth making that easily identifiable as well. The active noise cancelation is amazing along with sound quality.I did have an issue last year where they kept unpairing unexpectedly after a few seconds. I didn't want to give up on these and luckily I didn't. That issue has long been fixed by an android update. Now I'm converting all my family members to Skullcandy.As for the battery life, there are days I will wear these hours on end listening to music then torn them off. When I put them on again I'm usually at 70% battery life (on Android easy to see by looking at your connected Bluetooth devices). If I do run out of battery, a quick charge 10 minutes or more of I'm busy doing something and I'm right back at 100%.The cushions around the ears are comfortable although if you wear them for hours be prepared to sweat a little. The entire headset is adjustable too so as to accommodate different head sizes.Overall I highly recommend these! I don't think you'll find better quality sound in this price range. I forgot to mention I've had my first set of these for 3 years and counting now. They still work and charge seamlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Great sound quality especially for someone who is picky about sound, I have a big head and these don't squeeze and fit perfectly and are quite adjustable.Had no issues pairing it to my phone, I've had them for almost 2 weeks and only needed to charge once, and it charges very fast. The buttons don't lag and work perfectly as well. The noise cancellation is great, it doesn't block out everything alone but if you have music playing even at a very low volume you can't hear a thing.Saw a few reviews say it doesn't come with a bag when it does, along with a charging cord, and an aux chord for a wired option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, well builtm sound great and look good too
reviews.reviewText: I need these for work more than anything else since I need to concentrate on work and not be distracted. They fold up nicely and are easy to setup, connect and use right away. The verbal cues are on power on/off are a little loud for me but there isn't any question on when they turn on an off.The noise cancellation is a little low but acceptable. It doesn't cut out enough noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE MY HEADPHONES! These are FANTASTIC! I can still hear some things with the noise cancelling on, but it is definitely a lot quieter. Sound quality and comfort is fantastic. They are Bluetooth and connect really well, and they come with an aux connection if you'd rather do that. It doesn't seem like they do the noise cancelling when connected to aux though, but that's not a problem for me. They are pretty comfortable, they start to irritate me after about 3 hours, but that's pretty good because I am very sensitive. I also wear glasses and they work great with them. 100% recommend. Great product!
Great product, just what i wanted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Worth the money amazing sound & noise cancelling is superb

Très bon écouteurs pour la réduction du bruit mais sont un peu inconfortable à la longue. La qualité sonore est correcte sans plus.Dans l'ensemble bon rapport qualité prix car achetés à 50 euros. Ne valent sans doute pas 130 euros.

Me ha gustado mucho. los acabados son de calidad, el sonido es claro y la conexión inalámbrica no se corta y es muy rápida.Respecto al sonido considero que es muy bueno, aunque no soy un experto, pero los bajos son fuertes. Los utilizo en casa para ver películas, jugar a la PS4 escuchar música etc. y no hay ningún uso para el que no lo recomendaría.La cancelación de ruido funciona muy bien, aunque obviamente no consigues un silencio perfecto. Particularmente útil cuando trabajo ya que actualmente tengo una obra al lado y elimina en un 90-95% el ruido de la maquinaria.Muy muy recomendables por su relación calidad-precio.
Awesome.. the noise cancelling function works really well.
